Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1969...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/23/1972, off Bob Garibaldi (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1975, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/19/1975...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1976, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1977, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/29/1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1979, hitting .381 with 5 HR, 18 RBI...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (N) on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1981, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 6 RBI against San Francisco on 5/31/1981...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1981, hitting .421 with 3 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1981, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
